title: Teaching a Computer to Fight Itself (Implementing an OGRE AI)
description:
OGRE is an asymmetric board game pitting a futuristic fighting force of
infantry and armor against a single, massive, artificially intelligent
cyber tank. Figuring out a winning strategy was difficult, so I taught
my computer how to play the game, and learn to play it better using
Python.

Source code available at: https://github.com/gar0u/ogre-ai
